website_summaries.verdict: Excellent mid-range solution offering a wide array of valuable features. Not quite the capacities or rigidity of some rivals, but a very good value.
pros: Big, precision-ground cast iron table offers a solid platform for accurate cutting
A reliable all-rounder from a trusted brand
cons: No rip fence, miter guide, or work light
Setting blade guide is a little fiddly

customer_reviews.title: Base guide block moves
customer_reviews.text: I very much like this company and there products. This item has a design flaw. The bottom block that holds the roller bearings is secured to the steel frame with 1 bolt. The block swivels and does not hold the blade true. Delta, please fix this oversight and restore your good reputation.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super high quality...very surprised.
customer_reviews.text: This must be a well kept secret, as it is apparently USA made and of very high quality. Assembly was easy, and no problems. Can't believe how quiet and smooth it is...I really expected the worse, but was really surprised. Buy it if you need a home shop bandsaw!
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Really good saw
customer_reviews.text: Should get years of use out of this saw, now I just need to invest in a fence system, one small downside, the guide is not perfectly parallel to the blade in its travel, when I set the guide bearings to specifications while at the top position, I noticed the blade was no longer centered at the lowest position, it was touching the outside bearing, If it bothers me enough, I should be able to fix it with a shim or two. BTW, at the bottom of my stand, I went with the Bora Portamate PM-1100 wheel kit, very nice!
customer_reviews.author: C. Chaparro

customer_reviews.title: Delta Makes Excellent Tools
customer_reviews.text: I just received my delta 14" band saw. Absolutely solid tool. The cast iron table weighs a ton. Very solid. The motor is very quiet. All parts are well made. Assembly was easy. Only problem was that some hardware did not match descriptions in the manual. Drawback- no fence. Bought the kreg fence which fit perfectly. The cost of the saw, plus the fence is equivalent to other 14" saws of the same quality.
customer_reviews.author: AmiRand Custom Furniture & Cabinets

customer_reviews.title: Excellent saw
customer_reviews.text: What every girl needs! Cuts aluminum at work and wood home projects
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Tripp

customer_reviews.title: So far I am pleased with the product
customer_reviews.text: So far I am pleased with the product. It is a big improvement over the an old 3 wheel delta I had before. Even on wheels, it is more maneuverable due to it being lighter than some of the steel competitors. I do wish that it had an option to have a delta rip fence, although I am sure I can install a Kreg version.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Volmerding

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good overall
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good overall. There are a few design features that should have been flushed out more but It works and it's helped me be stay safe by not making dangerous cuts with other tools
customer_reviews.author: Francisco

customer_reviews.title: no rip fence.
customer_reviews.text: well pleased with the saw,the reason for four stars instead of five is because it doesn't have a rip fence or miter guide.it seems to be a very good saw.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this saw! This a fantastic saw and is a great deal at under $700

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Took some doing to get it delivered, but it was worth it. I love this saw!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin B. Quinn

customer_reviews.title: Best band saw I've ever had.
customer_reviews.text: I got it put it together easily and put it to work. It works like a jewel.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Corona

customer_reviews.title: Good deal, don't be afraid to purchase this product.
customer_reviews.text: Just got it together, adjusted and tested today. Really a solid saw for the price. Wish it came with fence and miter but added the Kreg precision fence. Went togethor well EXCEPT they only tapped 4 of the 5 required table mounts. Of course it was metric (M8 1.25) which I didn't have. Beyond that, the instructions take very careful reading for the adjustments. Plumbing up the table was a little difficult because the tilt mount is off center. Blade was installed but the bearings were not preset. I think it was well worth the money , especially for a table manufactured today.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Aiken

customer_reviews.title: Great saw, very good quality
customer_reviews.text: Great saw, very good quality. Only reason for the 4 instead of 5 was the shipment of hardware. Maybe their plan saves them money, but it sure takes longer to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: MuleSkinner

customer_reviews.title: Great saw.
customer_reviews.text: Well made, intuitive controls. I bought a mobile base, and can easily tuck it away when not in use, since it has a small footprint. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Big Daddy

customer_reviews.title: Good bandsaw but...
customer_reviews.text: Great saw easy to setup, however instructions are basic; hard to find guide setup for this saw on youtube or their website. Very limited info on this saw available in my various Google searches.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Rome

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: It's a Delta what more can one say!! This is a replacement for an old saw and an upgrade!! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: SMOKEY

customer_reviews.title: Works well and just as described.
customer_reviews.text: Works well right out of the box with only minimal fine tuning. Fitted it with a Kreg fence and handles resawing up to 6 inches. Nice saw for the intermediate and hobbyist woodworker.
customer_reviews.author: Barry D. Chandler, MD

customer_reviews.title: Value priced
customer_reviews.text: I have not used it yet . My last Delta saw had fewer plastic parts
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but so far I love
customer_reviews.text: My first band saw, but so far I love it
customer_reviews.author: David Ivy

customer_reviews.title: q
customer_reviews.text: saw was delivered undamaged. setup was a little tricky but if you have worked with band saws not very hard. table mount is a little light can twist the table side to side. added a kreg band saw fence very good choice there. resawed 4 inch wide white ash with the installed blade to my surprise it tracked and cut quite well. for the money, you get a quality entry level saw that will give you good service. wished it had a blade tension quick release.
customer_reviews.author: John L.

customer_reviews.title: Classic tool because it does the job
customer_reviews.text: Wood, aluminum, copper, stainless you name it, my delta cuts it like butter. A relatively simple, fairly priced tool built to last. I put it on rollers and can stick it in the corner in a 2’ square space. $10 blades! I pay $50 for a metal cutting circular saw blade so blades are also a screaming bargain.
customer_reviews.author: Dhopewell

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. Should last "forever"
customer_reviews.text: I own several Delta products (grinder, table saw, bandsaw). People say the quality has gone down over the year but I am truly happy with all of these. They are very accurate and work as expected!
customer_reviews.author: toml

customer_reviews.title: 1960s technology
customer_reviews.text: I am a wood turner with a 6-inch resawing cutting capacity it is under size this is old school nice saw but useless for woodturners unless it's over 10 " your engineers need a kick in the ass

customer_reviews.text: I own a 28-276 delta bandsaw with a riser kit for resawing the sliding bracket broke and no one has a replacement. So a perfectly good saw is useless!! I will not buy delta again

product_meta.title: Delta 28-400 14 in. 1 HP Steel Frame Band Saw
product_meta.description: 14-Inch 1HP Steel Frame Band Saw. @ speeds for added convenience, Heavy Duty Steel Frame Construction. All Ball Bearing upper and lower Guides. 2 Durable aluminum, rubber tireed, 9 spoke precision balanced wheels for superior blade tracking. Dust brush on lower wheel keeps blades clean; poly v-belt drive for smooth operation. Over sized table 15 3/4-Inch by 18 7/8-Inch precision ground cast iron; 4-Inch intregral dust port. Takes a standard 93 1/2-Inch blade.
feature_bullets: Heavy duty steel frame design reduces flexing and features a superior finish and aluminum trunnion table support for long-lasting durability
1 HP, 115V/230V, 1 phase TEFC motor with 2 speeds: 1,620 FPM and 3,340 FPM for wood and non-ferrous metal cutting
Two-speed pulley with easy tensioning system
Durable aluminum, rubber-coated upper and lower 9 spoke wheels are precision balanced for superior blade tracking
Oversized 15 3/4 in. x 18 7/8 in. precision ground cast iron table with t-slot miter capability tilts 3° left to 45° right with a positive stop at 90°
